title: "data visualization"

About this sitegbnmh

```{r, echo=F, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}

project_data <- read_excel("data.xlsx", sheet = 2)
cor(project_data$Inflation, project_data$`Core PCE`)
```

```{r, echo  =F}
project_data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Inflation, y = `Core PCE`)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```
